definition-item.definition-title: SAWS FOR WOOD OR SIMILAR MATERIAL; COMPONENTS OR ACCESSORIES THEREFOR (saws specially adapted for pruning or debranching A01G3/08; sawing apparatus specially adapted for felling trees A01G23/091; features not restricted to a particular type of wood saw B23D, e.g. attaching saw blades B23D51/00; machine tool frames, beds, pillars or like members, in general B23Q1/01)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Saws for sawing wood:
- Wood saws characterised by the active element:
- Portable or hand saws for wood: B27B9/00, B27B21/00
- Active elements of wood saws: B27B23/00, B27B33/00
- Accessories for wood saws: B27B25/00, B27B31/00
- Sawing trunks or logs, saws specially adapted therefor: B27B1/00, B27B3/00, B27B7/00, B27B15/00

Other large areas covering sawing are B23D45/00-B23D65/00 (sawing in general, sawing metal) and B28D1/02 (sawing stone). B23D is the main entry for sawing. Precedence is given to B23D. Features not restricted to a particular type of saw are classified in B23D. However, such features are classified in B27B if a more specific entry exists in B27B, for example:

list-item.paragraph-text: B27B5/30: mounting/securing devices for circular saw blades or spindles
B27B5/38: braking devices for the circular saw blade or the spindle
B27B17/00: details of chain saws, equipment for chain saws

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Sawing in general (unless a more specific entry exists in B27B)
Constructional features of particular parts per se of sawing machines or sawing devices
Details or components, e.g. casings, bodies, of portable power-driven saws not particularly related to the operation performed
Safety guards or devices specially designed for wood saws
Sawing stone or stone-like materials
Accessories specially adapted for use with machines for sawing of gems, jewels, crystals
Sawing gems, jewels, crystals with discs or wheels
Sawing gems, jewels, crystals with blades or wires
Accessories specially adapted for use with machines or devices for sawing stone

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Saws specially adapted for pruning or debranching
Sawing apparatus specially adapted for felling trees
Meat or bone saws
Surgical saws
Saws for dentistry
Grinders for cutting-off
Auxiliary devices facilitating proper operation of wood saws

section-body.paragraph-text: In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: Feeding work
moving a workpiece into engagement with a saw blade while sawing
Conveying or transporting work
moving a workpiece before, after or between sawing operations
Discharging work
moving a workpiece away from a saw blade after sawing

definition-item.definition-title: Methods for subdividing trunks or logs essentially involving sawing

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Saw benches with non-feedable circular saw blades for cross-cutting laterally fed workpieces
Cross-cutting reciprocating saws with power drive

definition-item.definition-title: Gang saw mills; Other sawing machines with reciprocating saw blades, specially designed for length sawing of trunks

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Gang saw mills; Other sawing machines with reciprocating saw blades, specially designed for length sawing of trunks

definition-item.definition-title: Sawing machines working with circular {or cylindrical} saw blades (for length sawing of trunks B27B7/00); Components or equipment therefor

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Sawing machines working with circular saw blades for length sawing of trunks
Arrangements for adjusting the mutual distances of circular saw machines for lengthwise sawing of trunks
Circular saws combined with band or strap sawing machines specially designed for length cutting of trunks
Machines for cutting through a work-piece with a tool having a rotational vector which is parallel to the surfaces generated by cutting
Slotting or mortising machines

definition-item.definition-title: {with at least one brake member contacting saw blade portions}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Circular saws including one or more brake members that touch the saw blade, such as touching at the teeth of the saw blade as in the image below, or touching at one or more sides of the saw blade.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this place:

definition-item.definition-title: Sawing machines working with circular saw blades, specially designed for length sawing of trunks

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Equipment for adjusting the mutual distance of circular wood saws in general

definition-item.definition-title: Portable power-driven circular saws for manual operation (details or components, e.g. handles, casings, of portable power-driven tools not particularly related to the operation performed B25F5/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Circular sawing machines for dividing plates in parts of determined size, e.g. panels
Details or components, e.g. casings, bodies, of portable power-driven saws not particularly related to the operation performed

definition-item.definition-title: Cross-cut reciprocating saws with power drive; Appurtenances therefor

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Saws with straight reciprocating saw blades.

definition-item.definition-title: Band or strap sawing machines (for length cutting of trunks B27B15/00); Components or equipment therefor

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Band or strap sawing machines specially designed for length cutting of trunks
Devices for guiding strap saw blades in general
Devices for tensioning strap saw blades in general

definition-item.definition-title: {with at least one brake member contacting saw blade portions}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Band saws including one or more brake members that touch the band saw blade, such as touching at the teeth of the band saw blade, or touching at one or more sides of the band saw blade.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this place:
Note, in the figure below, a brake member 16 contacts the side of the sawing band 4.

definition-item.definition-title: Band or strap sawing machines specially designed for length cutting of trunks

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Band or strap sawing machines specially designed for length cutting of trunks

definition-item.definition-title: Chain saws; Equipment therefor {(slotting or mortising machines equipped with chain cutters B27F5/06)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Slotting or mortising machines equipped with chain cutters

definition-item.definition-title: {with adjustment by at least one cam}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Arrangements for stretching a chain saw including at least one cam, where the cam can be a rotational or linear cam, and where the cam can include an internal or external camming surface.
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this place:
Note, in the figure below, a rotational cam (30) with an external camming surface.

definition-item.definition-title: {with adjustment by at least one threaded screw}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this place:

Note, in the figure below, threaded screw 382 is driven to rotate via rotation of knob 400, and rotation of the threaded screw 382 moves elements 310 and 370 in the direction of arrow 3105 to move guide bar 200 to adjust chain tension.

definition-item.definition-title: {with adjustment of a non-driven sprocket or pulley relative to the guide bar}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in this place:
Note, in the figure below, where sprocket 16 is positionally adjusted relative to the guide bar 18, in order to tension the chain.

definition-item.definition-title: Other reciprocating saws with power drive; Fret-saws

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

table-column.paragraph-text: Saws with oscillating saw blades

definition-item.definition-title: Hand saws without power drive ({hand saws with oscillating saw blades,} B27B19/14 takes precedence); Equipment for hand sawing, e.g. saw horses {(work benches B25H1/00; saw guides B27B11/02)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Saw guides
Saws benches or saw bucks for chain saws
Fret saws with hand drive
Work benches, horses in general

definition-item.definition-title: Other cutting of wood by non-rotary toothed tools; Tools therefor (cutting with hot wire B27M1/06)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Cutting with hot wire

definition-item.definition-title: Feeding devices for timber in saw mills or sawing machines; Feeding devices for trees ({B27B29/00}, B27B31/00 take precedence)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Gripping, clamping, or holding devices for the trunk or log in saw mills or sawing machines; travelling trunk or log carriages
Arrangements for conveying, loading, turning, adjusting, or discharging the log or timber, specially designed for saw mills or sawing machines

definition-item.definition-title: Guide fences or stops for timber in saw mills or sawing machines; Measuring equipment thereon (safety guards or devices specially designed for wood saws B27G19/00; constructional features of measuring devices G01B)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Devices for mitring wood
Safety guards or devices specially designed for wood saws
Constructional features of measuring devices

definition-item.definition-title: Gripping, clamping or holding devices for the trunk or log in saw mills or sawing machines (safety guards or devices specially designed for wood saws B27G19/00); Travelling trunk or log carriages {(for logs being held in a cantilever manner B27B17/0075)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Travelling trunk or log carriages for logs being held in a cantilever manner
Safety guards or devices specially designed for wood saws

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Sawing machines or sawing devices working with circular saw blades, characterised only by constructional features of particular parts

Sawing machines or sawing devices working with straight blades, characterised only by constructional features of particular parts; Carrying or attaching means for tools, covered by this subclass, which are connected to a carrier at both ends
Sawing machines or sawing devices working with strap saw blades, characterised only by constructional features of particular parts
Sawing machines or sawing devices not covered by one of groups B23D45/00 - B23D55/00

definition-item.definition-title: Arrangements for conveying, loading, turning, adjusting, or discharging the log or timber, specially designed for saw mills or sawing machines (B27B29/00 takes precedence {; arrangements for raising or lowering the feed rollers of gang saw mills B27B3/14; driving mechanisms for the feed rollers of gang saw mills B27B3/16})

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Arrangements for raising or lowering the feed rollers of gang saw mills
Driving mechanisms for the feed rollers of gang saw mills
Gripping, clamping, or holding devices for the trunk or log in saw mills or sawing machines; travelling trunk or log carriages
Article or material handling devices associated with conveyors

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Devices for determining the axis of a trunk

definition-item.definition-title: Sawing tools for saw mills, sawing machines, or sawing devices

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Saw chains for slotting or mortising devices
